page.title: 08Coppice High, Wolverhampton
page.content: Pupils at Coppice are aged 11-18 years. They are divided into years according to their age & each year has 6 or 7 forms.Soon like other schools in this borough,Coppice will have no 6th form. The girls wear grey skirts & cardigans & a blue & white blouse,the boys wear grey trousers & white shirts & a blazer. They have to wear striped ties. School begins at 8.45am & finishes at 3.20pm with a dinner hour & a break in the morning.The bell goes every 50 minutes in the morning which divides the lessons & every 45 minutes in the afternoon. We have Maths,English Geography,French,Science,RE,PE,Music, History.Also this year we had some computer lessons.We have annual visits to Bulgaria & France.We have merits for good work.This year we all did a sponsored walk or swim & raised 2700 pounds towards a mini-bus.
